feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow and Blowing Snow, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 3:29 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: NE 41 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
